author: third_watch
title: Harvey Weinstein speaks out after sex allegations: 'We all make mistakes'
summary: Harvey Weinstein spoke publicly for the first time since numerous women have come forward with allegations of sexual harassment and, in some cases, assault. ... A second chance, I hope," Weinstein said in a video shot Wednesday outside daughter Lily Weinstein’s Los Angeles home obtained by ABC News. Weinstein, 65, has reportedly left Los Angeles headed to a rehabilitation clinic for behavioral issues including sex addiction.

author: DeltaBravo
title: The excruciating uncertainty of the California wildfires
summary: Perhaps the only thing that’s certain for the roughly 175,000 residents of this California wine-growing region being terrorized by devastating wildfires is that no one knows what’s going to happen next.

author: ipostwhaticareabout
title: LeBron James, Colin Kaepernick have perfect reactions to Eminem's lethal Trump cypher
summary: Rapper Eminem aimed a devastating blow at President Trump during the BET Hip Hop Awards on Tuesday night.

author: DeltaBravo
title: Republican senator asks Trump if he's 'recanting oath' over war with press
summary: Donald Trump's ongoing war with the media over "fake news" escalated on Wednesday with the president calling for networks, and specifically NBC, to have their licenses revoked over reporting what he called "pure fiction." And one Republican senator inserted himself in the middle of the fight Wednesday evening. The White House and Defense Secretary Jim Mattis denied the report. Trump's threat to pull NBC's license drew Sen. Ben Sasse, R-Neb., into the fight.
